column2:
Now experience Las Vegas Church of the Harvest anytime, anywhere . . . engage with Christians on a deeper level . . .ignite your walk with the Lord . . . embolden your faith and witness!   

Yes, put all this at your fingertips—with the state-of-art, custom-designed app for your mobile phone. This app is free and gives you unlimited access to these prime features:  

•        MESSAGES—watch and listen from home or anywhere across the globe!  Instantly access past favorites, sermon series, and a treasure trove of reliable content to boost your faith journey. 

•          READING PLAN—In addition to our life steps, create space for the Holy Spirit to speak into your life by reading daily verses right from our app.

•        INTERACTIVE PRAYER WALL—an incredible way to connect with a powerful prayer community: share prayer needs, your own requests, and praises; get instant prayer updates, keep your prayer list “in your pocket” to check often, and let others know you’re praying for them—a prayer warrior’s paradise!     

•        CALENDAR—stay up-to-date on church happenings.  Add events to your calendar, set reminders, get directions, and share with friends—pronto!

•        Now, Truly Innovative: GIVE OFFERINGS EASILY—with just two clicks!  Completely secure, keeps your tithe “on track,” eliminates paperwork, and helps you stay mission-minded.  Amazing! 

•        INITIATIVES—“feel the heartbeat” of each ministry, explore ways to get connected, and plug into your spot to serve.

•        Discover Our HISTORY, VISION, MISSION, and More—it’s like a  “church leader photo album” in your pocket, with added bios, church background, future goals, and more—all ready to enrich and edify your church experience!     

•        DIRECTIONS, CONTACT INFO—conveniently displayed to de-stress your day. 

•        PHOTOS—a favorite feature for all ages.  When the church posts exciting content—photos from mission trips and church events, personal testimonies, and more--you can watch, share, and impact others with the Gospel. 

•        INVITE Friends and Help Transform Lives—as you share content effortlessly on your favorite social site:  Facebook, Twitter, SMS, and e-mail. “Go viral” with anything and everything, and help win souls for Christ!      

Why wait?  Download this free app today . . . and get your faith moving on a remarkable mobile adventure.  
 
For more information, visit http://lvchonline.org/

Welcome to SANDS RESORTS Photos!
 
Share & Enhance your Memories! Have our photographers take your photo while visiting SANDS RESORTS Event Photos.
 
A photographer will give you a Photo Claim Card that provides you with exclusive online access to your photos. Simply scan the QR code with using this app or go to the website and enter the unique Photo ID printed on the back of your Photo Claim Card.
 
The SANDS RESORTS Event Photos website provides you with the ability to share your photos with family and friends on Facebook*, Twitter and via email and if available, to purchase prints and custom photo gifts.

Promote your meeting in real-time 

Our fully-customisable, hassle-free mobile app dedicated to your event allows you to quickly:

-  Update schedules 
-  Make news announcements to attendees with the latest information 

It also gives you the added advantage of going paperless, helping eliminate the environmental impact and costs associated with paper-based materials.

The Marina Bay Sands Meetings Concierge features:

-  More than 30 fully customisable built-in features and components such as in-app messaging, exhibitor and speaker profiles, photo galleries and social sharing.
-  Security, privacy and access settings.
-  Branding and advertising opportunities.

Speak with our sales representative today to add this option to your next event!

Asia’s leading integrated resort destination, Sands Resorts Macao is made up of 8 world-class hotel destinations, The Venetian Macao, The Parisian Macao, Sands Macao, Holiday Inn Macao, Cotai Central, Conrad Macao, Cotai Central, Sheraton Grand Macao Hotel, Cotai Central, The St Regis Macao, Cotai Central, Four Seasons Hotel and their combined 12,000+ rooms, 850+ shopping outlets, venues and theatres, and 150+ restaurants, ranging from casual to fine dining. 

-	Booking: Book a hotel stay in one of our 8 world-class hotels, The Venetian Macao, The Parisian Macao, Sands Macao, Holiday Inn, Conrad, Sheraton Grand, St Regis and Four Seasons. 
-	Offers: Checkout your exclusive offers in dining, shopping, entertainment and transportation. 
-	Your Rewards: Keep track of your points.

Download now to enjoy all exclusive offers.
